title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr, Llanddeusant, Anglesey.
title.cy: Cangen Merched y Wawr Llanddeusant, Rhanbarth Môn. Caffi Melin Llynon - Mehefin 2015.

description.en: Llun o aelodau'r gangen yn cael tê yng Nghaffi Melin Llynon - Mehefin 2015. (Blaen) Edna Parry, Rosina Jones, Mai Parry, Margaret Jones, Jane Owen, Menna Jones (Cefn) Ceri Williams, Marian Jones, Dorothy Wright, Marian Jones, Dorothy Wright, Eluned Rowlands, Elegie Williams, Pegi Williams, Elegie Williams, Elizabeth Jones.
